mdRecord.dcterms:title: E-Summit
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gross, Stephanie
mdRecord.dcterms:description: E-Summit panel called Reconceptualizing Commerce. Participants included Ryan R. Nelson, University of Virginia McIntire School of Commerce; William Battino, from PricewaterhouseCoopers; Shelby W. Bonnie, from CNET Inc.; Robert W. Harris, from About.com Inc.; Sonja L. Hoel, from Menlo Ventures; Timothy A. Koogle, from Yahoo! Inc.; David G. Smith, from University of Virginia McIntire School of Commerce; Randall R. Smith, from University of Virginia Darden School; Joel G. Ramin, University student; and Jeffrey C. Walker, from Chase Capital Partners.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Press coverage
University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office
